犬と猿: (いぬとさる) - dogs and monkeys (esp. as an example of a bad relationship, like that between cats and dogs)
犬に論語: (いぬにろんご) - wasting one's breath (trying to explain something); (reading) the Analects of Confucius to a dog
犬の子: (いんのこ) - puppy/whelp; magic word said to comfort a frightened child and put him to sleep
犬もあるけば棒に当たる: (いぬもあるけばぼうにあたる) - (proverb) no matter what you attempt, tragedy may befall you; (proverb) good luck may come unexpectedly
犬もくわない: (いぬもくわない) - avoided by everybody; disliked by everybody; not even a dog will eat
犬も喰わない: (いぬもくわない) - avoided by everybody; disliked by everybody; not even a dog will eat
犬も歩けば棒に当たる: (いぬもあるけばぼうにあたる) - (proverb) no matter what you attempt, tragedy may befall you; (proverb) good luck may come unexpectedly
犬も歩けば棒に当る: (いぬもあるけばぼうにあたる) - (proverb) no matter what you attempt, tragedy may befall you; (proverb) good luck may come unexpectedly
犬も食わない: (いぬもくわない) - avoided by everybody; disliked by everybody; not even a dog will eat
犬サフラン: (イヌサフラン) - meadow saffron (Colchicum autumnale); autumn crocus; naked lady
犬ジステンパー: (いぬジステンパー) - canine distemper
犬侍: (いぬざむらい) - cowardly or depraved samurai
犬嫌い: (いぬぎらい) - dog hater; dog hating
犬枇杷: (イヌビワ) - Ficus erecta (species of ficus)
犬桜: (イヌザクラ) - Prunus buergeriana (species of flowering cherry)
犬槙: (イヌマキ) - yew plum pine (Podocarpus macrophyllus)
犬樟: (イヌグス) - Machilus thunbergii (species of laurel)
犬殺し: (いぬころし) - dogcatcher; person who used to catch dogs and execute them for rabies prevention
犬猫: (いぬねこ) - dogs and cats/pets; something trivial/worthless thing
犬猿: (sabe) - cats and dogs (as an example of a bad relationship)
犬猿の仲: (けんえんのなか) - loggerheads; like cats and dogs; relationship of dogs and monkeys
犬畜生: (いぬちくしょう) - mangy cur; low animal; beast
犬皮: (けんぴ) - dog skin; dog hide; dog fur
犬矢来: (いぬやらい) - short arched (traditionally bamboo) fence around walls of traditional townhouses, esp. in Kyoto (protects lower walls from fouling or damage)
犬神: (いぬがみ) - evil dog spirit; dog god
犬神使い: (いぬがみづかい) - evil shaman; witch doctor
犬科: (いぬか) - Canidae; family containing domestic dogs, wolves, foxes, etc.
犬薺: (イヌナズナ) - woodland draba (Draba nemorosa); woodland whitlow-grass
犬追物: (いぬおうもの) - dog-hunting event of Kamakura period
犬酸漿: (いぬほおずき) - black nightshade (plant) (Solanum nigrum)
犬食い: (いぬくい) - eating like a dog; sloppy eating
犬馬: (けんば) - dogs and horses; one's humble self
犬馬の労: (けんばのろう) - rendering what little service one can
犯: (han/ok) - crime , perpetrators of (some) crime, (some type of) crime
犯す: (おかす) - to commit (e.g. crime)/to perpetrate/to make (e.g. mistake); to break (e.g. rule)/to violate/to transgress/to contravene; to rape/to violate/to ravish/to deflower
犯人を匿う: (はんにんをかくまう) - to shelter a criminal
犯人を捕まえる: (はんにんをつかまえる) - to arrest the culprit
犯人蔵匿罪: (はんにんぞうとくざい) - (crime of) harboring a fugitive (harbouring)
犯則: (はんそく) - infringement; violation; breach of regulations; infraction
犯罪に及ぶ: (はんざいにおよぶ) - to commit a crime; to resort to crime
犯罪人: (はんざいにん) - criminal; culprit; offender; rogue
犯罪心理学: (はんざいしんりがく) - criminal psychology
犯罪性: (はんざいせい) - criminality; criminal propensity
犯罪死: (はんざいし) - wrongful death; death caused by violent crime
犯罪発生率: (はんざいはっせいりつ) - crime rate
犯罪組織: (はんざいそしき) - crime syndicate; criminal syndicate
犯罪被害者: (はんざいひがいしゃ) - victim of crime
犯行声明文: (はんこうせいめいぶん) - letter of responsibility (for a crime)
犯行時刻: (はんこうじこく) - time of the crime
犯行現場: (はんこうげんば) - scene of the crime (offense, offence)
状勢: (じょうせい) - state of things; state of affairs; condition; situation; circumstances
状態: (joutai) - status atual, condição, situação, circunstâncias, estado
